nodes.text: The Mendacious Oasis was an oasis located in the Dune Sea on the planet Tatooine. During the Cold War, it was inhabited by a Geonosian militia led by Nekra the Warlord.
The Mendacious Oasis was created for Star Wars: The Old Republic, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game released by BioWare on December 20, 2011.
